title: MASSIVE TROLL IN RANKS
body:
Im REALLY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! pissed at ranks right now I'm s1 had promos to g5 last night ended up 2,2 1 more game go and what do you know we started to win a fair bit but no someone decides to troll sell all his items then start feeding think he ended up 0/19 and then blamed us AND he was playing Lissandra vs Leblanc and did not take mr or did not know how to vs her and know how to play Lissandra.. WHO takes mid and doesn't know how to play the  champ now my promos are ruined because someone wanted to try out a champion in ranks…..   But hay i guess ill now get stuck with more silver trollers. So I deserve gold but no all these people have a cry because either 1. we don't gank… as people say gank winning lane is better then they can carry. 2. KNOW YOUR LANE before you come to ranks yes i know people get stuck in support but not when your 2nd pick. 3. FOLLOW your enemy if she roams if not push don't stand there having a go at us because we didn't ward (which we did) 4 MOST IMPORTANT RULE THAT SILVERS DONT UNDERSTAND PING THE GOD DAM MAP WHEN THEY LEAVE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Sorry for this being so long I'm just so pissed right now need to get it off my shoulders too all you Silvers and Bronze players… 
 hope you have fun  and have a wonderful day ;D

replies.body:
There are trolls in all of the tiers. You aren't magically going to leave them all in silver when you finally get yo ass into gold. 

***Wake up into reality. ***

Promo trolls also happen to the majority of players, you aren't anything special. The best you can do for now is to report them at the end of game and block the players.

Im not an idiot but thanks for pointing that out for me…
and as i said I'm getting it off my shoulders I'm not a stuck up person only thinking of them selfs I'm saying it because the whole team was mad at him/her even the enemy team reported him/her but i guess nothing happened.

> Sorry for this being so long I'm just so pissed right now need to get it off my shoulders too all you Silvers and Bronze players… 

Don't you fit into the Silver/Bronze category too?

> [{quoted}](name=Golden Acorn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EQlPZAGo,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-18T08:42:42.721+0000)
>
> Don't you fit into the Silver/Bronze category too?

Im meaning to the people that think oh I'm just top no ones going to gank or oh my support has to ward.. No everyone has to ward its the way to win games for example. Look at silver/bronze/Gold vs akali no one gets pink wards or upgraded sweeper i know because I've had to ask people in at least 10 ranks so far to get pinks or sweeper and its getting annoying to do so because they should know by now.. i don't know feeling like deleting this post due to everyone having a cry about what I've said. i was  aiming to actually get to people how things affect games like wards, choosing lane, and picks..

OMG……………. 
Im not stupid i know I'm going to get close to the same but its higher up so you get mostly better people I've played in gold on a friends account for a few games and it feels a lot better then silver but YES I KNOW………… 
And Golden Acorn yes i might. I'm not going to say that I'm demanding i go to gold or I'm the best and should go to gold. I still have things to get better with but  i think I've earned gold I've carried almost every promo and that 1 promo just that 1 i got a troll and made me go back so yes everyone gets mad but what got me madder was that it was either Go to Gold or stay in silver. Which my goal was to get to gold by the end of the season so finishing it this early it just feels good and then bam!!! a troll on my last promo just makes me sad :,( But yeh sorry I'm meant to be in bronze 5….
